title: ISic020711. ISic020711
body:
Facsimile Images

Πιβε   ←
Pibe   ←

Apparatus criticus

Text after Watkins 1995

English translation

Drink!

Italian translation

Bevi!

commentary

An interesting aspect of this document is highlighted by Antonaccio and Shea 2015, p. 60: «[...] it is interactive. It could only be read when the vessel was raised and tipped towards the drinker’s face. The user was already drinking in all likelihood when he or she read the imperative, which further demanded that the remainder of the wine in the vessel be consumed». For a similar case see ISic020712).

bibliography

    Antonaccio, Shea 2015 60, fig. 1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002358 Watkins 1995 39-41 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002357
    Antonaccio, Neils 1995 277, pl. VII.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002359
